entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for May 20, 2024

summary.caption: The bozone layer: shielding the rest of the solar system from the Earth’s harmful effects.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for May 20, 2024

summary.caption: “Oh, yeah? Well, I’d rather be a living corpse made from dismembered body parts than a hunchbacked little grave robber like you!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for May 20, 2024

summary.caption: God as a kid tries to make a chicken in his room.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for May 20, 2024
The Far Side comic 5 for May 20, 2024

summary.caption: “Calm down, Edna. … Yes, it’s some giant, hideous insect … but it could be some giant, hideous insect in need of help.”
